General.Name: Taiji Computer Corp Ltd
General.Description: Taiji Computer Corporation Limited operates as a software and information technology service company. It provides information system construction, cloud computing, big data, and other related services to government affairs, public security, enterprises, and other industries. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Beijing, China.
